code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faShareNodes}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var SHARE_LINK="www.2010heardle.com";var ShareButton=function ShareButton(){var copyToClipboard=function copyToClipboard(text){var unsecuredCopyToClipboard=function unsecuredCopyToClipboard(text){var textArea=document.createElement("textarea");textArea.value=text;textArea.style.height="0px";textArea.style.width="0px";document.body.append(textArea);textArea.focus();textArea.select();try{document.execCommand('copy');}catch(err){console.error('Unable to copy to clipboard',err);}document.body.remove(textArea);};if(window.isSecureContext&&navigator.clipboard){console.log("secure");navigator.clipboard.writeText(text);}else{unsecuredCopyToClipboard(text);console.log("unsecure");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{id:"cp-link",onClick:function onClick(){return copyToClipboard(SHARE_LINK);},children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faShareNodes}),"Copy Link"]})});};export default ShareButton;
